document.title: Accelerator Sample
document.paragraph:
accelerator.png accelerator 400 300
2Compiling
Start Visual Studio .NET
Choose Open Project from the File menu.
Navigate to \compiler\examples\(.net version)\vision2\accelerator\ and select accelerator.eifp
Clicking open loads the selected project
Launch EiffelStudio.
Select Use existing Ace (control file) and click OK
Browse to Eiffel54\examples\vision2\accelerator\
Choose the Ace file
Choose the directory where the project will be compiled, by default the same directory containing the Ace file.
Click bold>OK.
2Running After launching the application, you will see a window displayed with a similar appearance to the one above. When the window has the focus, the key combination Ctrl + Q will exit the application.
2Under the Hood An EV_ACCELERATOR is created and associated with the EV_TITLED_WINDOW used for the main window of the application. The association is made by adding the accelerator to the accelerators list of the window. This sample contains the following class:
ACCELERATOR
